ygData.subject: Re: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Let me throw off your statistics by saying I have worn Rusty Spike Shoulder pads and currently have a Lizzy Mantle (5 AC) on my shoulder, never mesh or
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:27 PM 2/6/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Clarity <roderick.duncan@...>
>
>Actually shiverback has the monk GM look- same as cured. So the level
>50 monks do have some of the same look as the level 1-20s.
>
>And I'm willing to make a very big bet that 95% of level 30-45 monks are
>wearing cured in at least one place- shoulders. :) The other 5% are
>wearing mesh there.
>
>
>Clarity Harvestmoon,
>Karana

Let me throw off your statistics by saying I have worn Rusty Spike Shoulder
pads and currently have a Lizzy Mantle (5 AC) on my shoulder, never mesh or
cured... Dare to be different! : )


In Quellious's Name,

Manjushri Bodhisattva
Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)
